abstract: Large companies may stand to benefit from their presence in fast-growing emerging markets like China.
snippet: Large companies may stand to benefit from their presence in fast-growing emerging markets like China.
lead_paragraph: EVER since big blue-chip domestic stocks fell out of favor in early 2000, many market strategists have regularly been predicting their imminent return to glory.

headline.main: Stage Is Set (Again) for a Blue-Chip Revival
headline.print_headline: Stage Is Set (Again) For a Blue-Chip Revival
